SEARCH
Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem.model

Class DataCollection

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.model.DataCollection
public class DataCollection extends Object
A container class that holds all database objects for the exam system. This class serves as a central point of access to all data storage components of the application, including courses, exams, grades, users, and questions.
